Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the establishment of twenty-five year retirement programs for members of the New York city employees' retirement system employed as fire protection inspectors and associate fire protection inspectors
Summary: Establishes twenty-five year retirement programs for members of the New York city employees' retirement system employed as fire protection inspectors and associate fire protection inspectors.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the establishment of twenty-five year retirement programs for members of the New York city employees' retirement system employed as fire protection inspectors and associate fire protection inspectors
